news_header: The Finnish Economic Committee is holding a hearing on recent online banking outages affecting Nordea.
news_text: The Finnish Economic Committee has requested testimonies from both authorities and a representative from Nordea, which has recently faced numerous technical issues. The hearing is scheduled for next Wednesday and will include testimonies from Minister of Economic Affairs Wille Rydman and representatives from various financial and cybersecurity institutions. Recent outages have particularly affected Nordea's online banking services, with the latest incident occurring today.
